00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.

00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "errors.h"
00011 #include "enums.h"
00012 #include "namespaces.h"
00013 #include "variables.h"
00014 #include "constants.h"
00015 #include "objects.h"
00016 #include "scope.h"
00017 
00018 string keywordNew(MavenCompiler* c, string entity, string element, string args, string& type) {
00019         string rawType = stripRawType(entity);
00020         int depth = ((element != "") ? 1 : 0);
00021         //cout << "entity = '" << entity << "', element = '" << element << "', args = '" << args << "', line = " << c->lineNumber << endl;
00022         
00023         // if this is a native type
00024         StringList types;
00025         MavenMutability mut;
00026         if(isDataType(rawType)) {
00027                 type = appendArrayDepth(c, rawType, depth);
00028                 string r = "new maven::" + rawType + "Array(" + dissectCode(c, element, types, mut) + ")";
00029                 // bug #54: make sure types is 'int'
00030                 return r;
00031         }
00032         
00033         // first make sure the class exists
00034         bool isEnum = false;
00035         type = appendArrayDepth(c, findMavenObjectPath(c, trim(entity)), depth);
00036         if(stripRawType(type) == MAVEN_INVALID) {
00037                 if(enumExists(c, stripRawType(entity))) {
00038                         isEnum = true;
00039                         type = c->currentNamespace + "." + appendArrayDepth(c, entity, depth);
00040                 } else {
00041                         pushError(c, "Unknown class '%s'", stripRawType(type));
00042                         return MAVEN_INVALID;
00043                 }
00044         }
00045         
00046         int namespaceID, objectID;
00047         findClass(c, entity, namespaceID, objectID);
00048         
00049         // if its a single Object
00050         if(element == "") {
00051                 string r = "new ";
00052                 r += c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).name + "::" + c->namespaces->at(namespaceID).objects->at(objectID)->name;
00053                 for(int i = 0; i < depth; ++i)
00054                         r += "*";
00055                 
00056                 // args is assumed to be predissected.
00057                 return r + "(" + args + ")";
00058         } else {
00059                 string elements = dissectCode(c, element, types, mut);
00060                 // bug #54: make sure types is 'int'
00061                 
00062                 string r = "new maven::";
00063                 if(isEnum) {
00064                         r += "int";
00065                         rawType = "int";
00066                         int nID = findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace), enumID = findEnumID(c, nID, entity);
00067                         if(trim(args) == "")
00068                                 args = intToString(c->namespaces->at(nID).enums[enumID].getDefaultValue());
00069                 } else r += "object";
00070                 
00071                 string tempVar = getNextTempVariable(c);
00072                 if(isDataType(rawType))
00073                         c->beforeLine += rawType + "* " + tempVar + " = new " + rawType + "[" + elements + "];\n";
00074                 else c->beforeLine += "maven::Object** " + tempVar + " = new maven::Object*[" + elements + "];\n";
00075                 c->beforeLine += "for(int __INIT = 0; __INIT < " + elements + "; ++__INIT)\n";
00076                 if(isDataType(rawType)) {
00077                         if(trim(args) == "")
00078                                 args = "0";
00079                         c->beforeLine += tempVar + "[__INIT] = " + args + ";\n";
00080                 } else c->beforeLine += tempVar + "[__INIT] = (maven::Object*) new " + rawType + "(" + args + ");\n";
00081                 
00082                 r += "Array(" + elements + "," + tempVar + ")";
00083                 return r;
00084         }
00085 }
